item.title: <h:outputText/> go home you are drunk!
item.description: This is just a copy of the post I wrote in the HP corporate blog, but just wanted to post it as well to spread the word: While working on a JSF (Java Server Faces) test case recently I had one of those WAT?!?! moments - where something you take for granted starts behaving in a completely different way from how you expect. In this case it was even worse, since the behavior I was observing was breaking my application security and undermining the trust I place on libraries and frameworks as a developer.
